settings.conversionRate: Conversion rate 1 XP for x Points
settings.levelShowcaseHelp: Levels example will be refreshed on save
settings.interval: Minutes interval to add xp to online users when stream online
settings.offlineInterval: Minutes interval to add xp to online users when stream offline
settings.messageInterval: How many messages to add xp
settings.messageOfflineInterval: How many messages to add xp when stream offline
settings.perInterval: How many xp to add per online interval
settings.perOfflineInterval: How many xp to add per offline interval
settings.perMessageInterval: How many xp to add per message interval
settings.perMessageOfflineInterval: How many xp to add per message offline interval
